name: ContraceptiveImplantProvisionProcedures
title: Contraceptive Implant Provision Procedures
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Family planning - provision and use of most and moderately effective contraceptive methods, access to long-acting reversible contraception (LARC)),(Data Element Scope: Procedure codes indicating insertion or reinsertion of contraceptive implant, a most effective method of contraception),(Inclusion Criteria: Procedure codes indicating insertion or reinsertion of contraceptive implant, a most effective method of contraception),(Exclusion Criteria: Any contraceptive method that is not a contraceptive implant; Most effective (i.e., sterilization, intrauterine devices or systems) or moderately effective (i.e., injectables, oral pills, patch, or ring) methods of contraception; Less effective methods of contraception (i.e., diaphragm, male condom, female condom, withdrawal, sponge, fertility-awareness based methods, spermicide))
